projects.title: Radio Player built in React using Sveriges Radio API:s
projects.description: Radio Player built in React using Sveriges Radio API:s and the page is made to be responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.
projects.name: Radio Player

projects.title: News site built with Google News API. Client: Bonnier News
projects.description: Collaborating with Dagens Nyheter att Bonnier News me and my team built a news paper in React using Google News API. We added a weather API and the site is made to be responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.
projects.name: News Site

projects.title: Career page built in React. Client: Comprend
projects.description: As a team we built a career page in React for the fast growing consultancy company Comprend. We were assigned wireframes and an internal career API from Comprend. The site is made out of four pages a landing page, a job listing page, a job opening page and a colleagues of Comprend page. Navigation between the pages is built with React router
projects.name: News Site

projects.title: Weather dashboard built with a weather API in JavaScript
projects.description: Weather dashboard built in JavaScript that tells today's weather and temperature using a weather API. The background changes depending on what temperature it is.
projects.name: News Site

projects.title: Prodouct Listing Page built in React
projects.description: Product listing page built in React made to look like an e-comerce pharmacy store. Made with a costum JSON file with an array listing all the products. The JSON file is used to render a React component for each product. A hover effect is added to display more information. It is made to be responsive with media queries for mobile and tablet.
projects.name: Product Page

projects.title: Clock built in React
projects.description: Clock built by using state in React. The clock has a paus button and a start button and the background changes based on the time of the day.
projects.name: Clock
